name: Sultan Jumps
description:
Sultan Jumps is a platformer game with difficult challenges. You play a grandmother who goes looking for her grandson who got lost while chasing his balloon. It has challenging platforming levels and mastering jumping is very important. One mistake can cause a long fall.

Gameplay:

-You must master jumping!
There are many difficult sections throughout the game. You won't be able to pass all the platforms in one go. You have to try again and figure out where you should jump. Even if you pass a platform, you may fall much lower than that platform and have to cross the same platform again.

-Use your double jump ability!
Sultan is a character who can double jump. But when you make the second jump is very important. If you make the second jump too early or too late, you may miss the platforms or hit your head on a wall.

-Sultan has some things to tell you!
Sultan is a character who talks a lot. If you hit the ground with a certain speed, Sultan will say something to you afterwards and they won't be nice words. Sultan has dozens of unique things to say to you. Be patient and don't make her angrier.

Content:

Sultan Jumps is a game developed by one person. All graphics, sounds, levels, music and story were created entirely by one person.

  • Fully hand-drawn pixel graphics
  • Quality sound effects, all organically recorded
  • High resolution pixel landscapes
  • Levels prepared by a developer who is passionate about platformer games
  • Full controller support
